binary.name: ppmd
binary.syntax: ppmd [-smooth] [-scale sf] [-wdt width] [-hgt height] [-display display] [-xoff xoff] [-yoff yoff] [name]

option.od: print the help message and exit.
percentage scale factor to display image at.
set the width of the image to width pixels.
set the height of the image to height pixels.
connect to the xterminal named display.
open the window, xoff pixels from the left edge of the screen.
open the window ypad pixels from the top edge of the screen.
image filename. If this is omitted the image will be read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Displays an extended Portable PixMap (PPMX) on an X-terminal.

description.p: Displays a Portable PixMap (PPM) on an X-terminal.
The image file is displayed in a window on the terminal. Clicking a mouse button in the window will terminate the program.

example.description: Display the PPMX file inp.ppm on the X-terminal.
